full_summary:
# Tender Notice for Furniture for Workspaces
## Solicitation Number: R00000158383

A request for proposal (RFP) has been issued by Shared Services Canada (SSC) for the supply of furniture for workspaces. The RFP is based on the Furniture for Workspaces Supply Arrangement (SA) with number E60PQ-140003/PQ.

### Important Dates

* Publication Date: January 26, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: February 6, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 26, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 29, 2024

### Tender Information

* Tender Method: Competitive – Selective Tendering
* Tender Status: Expired (Please note that this tender has expired, and no additional bids will be accepted.)
* Tender Description: The RFP is issued to obtain bids for the supply of office furniture.

### Selection Criteria

* Lowest Price

### Other Relevant Information

*regions of Opportunity:
  * Canada
* regions of Delivery:
  * Canada
* contracting Entity Information:
  * Shared Services Canada (SSC)
  * 400 Cooper Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K2P 2H8, Canada
* contract Attention Information:
  * Contact Person: Julie Dessureault
  * Email: Julie.Dessureault@ssc-spc.gc.ca
  * Phone: (613) 608-3114

### Facsimile Bid Notification
* None

### Note
A complete copy of the RFP document is available for download at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30502/rfp-r158383--english_0.pdf (English) or https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30502/rfp-r158383-french.pdf (French). 
All qualified companies are encouraged to bid.
